    public class IsoscelesTriangle
extends Triangle
    This class maintains information for drawing a Triangle and extends Polygon.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IsoscelesTriangle

        public IsoscelesTriangle(java.awt.Point pointLB,
                         int base,
                         int height,
                         java.awt.Color color,
                         boolean filled)
        Triangle constructor.
        Parameters:
        pointLB - The point on the base of an isosceles triangle that is NOT the right angle
        base - The width of the base.
        height - The height at the apex of the triangle (negative to flip the orientation).
        color - Desired color of the triangle.
        filled - Whether or not the triangle should be filled.
